name: PVC OG
description: PVC OG is a proprietary strain introduced by Positive Vibrations Collective in Long Beach, California. This strain was developed to provide focus for times when patients need to medicate without compromising productivity. It can also help to calm anxious thoughts and clear a busy mind.
